::Perndabot/Repressor::

Perndabot jumps back from the flames of his own missiles, one of Hot 
Rod's missiles hitting him in the side. He growls, firing a missile 
back at the ex-autobot and keeping an eye on Epyon.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Repressor groans, standing up and looking around the battlefield. He 
had no idea ho wlong he'd been out, but it must have been a long time.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He spun his saber around, destroying both missiles. The explosian 
could
> still hurt both Epyon and Perndabot. Epyon held his position as fire
> surronded his body. When it cleared he was ready for battle.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He saw the explosian and came running. Seeing what was going on, he
> launched two missiles at Perndabot.
